mapper.select: select count(*) from reviews where id=#{id}
select * from(select rownum rnum, r.* from(select * from reviews where id=#{id} order by visited desc ) r) where rnum >=#{start} and rnum <=#{end}
select count(*) from reviews where hospital=#{hospital}
select * from(select rownum rnum, r.* from(select * from reviews where hospital=#{id} order by visited desc ) r) where rnum >=#{start} and rnum <=#{end}
select * from reviews where reviewNum = #{reviewNum} and hospital = #{hospital}
